thread.section_title: Sports Jobs and Sports Internships - WorkInSports.com
thread.title: Account Supervisor - NASCAR - Sports Marketing

title: Account Supervisor - NASCAR - Sports Marketing
text: Posted/Updated: 10-13-2015 Brief Job Description: Are you a marketing professional with experience in event management and sports marketing? Are you passionate about NASCAR or the motorsports industry? We are looking for an Account Supervisor.   Since your site launched in 2000, WorkInSports.com has been the go to place for USA Baseball when we are looking to fill full-time openings and internships. Your reputation throughout the sports industry as a vital tool for job seekers and employers is well deserved. Thanks again! David Perkins
